title: Tari Maate Once More
overview: It is a love triangle with humorous situational comedy and masti masala content. There is a suspense, romance, comedy, drama, melodrama, aggression, problems at one situation. There are six friends Mihir, Tara, Aaisha, Jaadu, Maggie and Harry. Mihir and Aaisha love each other but Tara loves Mihir. See what happens next?
